steps.title: Click "Notepad".
steps.content: Click "Notepad". This should be the top app in your search.

steps.title: Review your Notepad.
steps.content: Review your Notepad. You are now ready to begin using Notepad!

steps.title: Scroll down to "Windows Accessories".
steps.content: Scroll down to "Windows Accessories". [1] X Research source On Windows 10, you won't be able to find Notepad using this method. You can, however, refer to method one to find it.

steps.title: Type in a name for your file.
steps.content: Type in a name for your file.

steps.title: Double-click your document.
steps.content: Double-click your document. This will open your text file in Notepad!
